scripts.compile: node -e "const p=require('path'); const bin=p.join(__dirname,'./.bin/circom'); const cmd=bin; const libLocal = p.join(__dirname,'src'); const libNodeModules = p.join(__dirname,'..','node_modules','circomlib','circuits'); if(require('fs').existsSync(bin)){process.exit(require('child_process').spawnSync(bin,['-l', libLocal, '-l', libNodeModules, p.join('src','ExamProof.circom'),'--r1cs','--wasm','--sym','-c','-o','build/'],{stdio:'inherit'}).status);} else {process.exit(require('child_process').spawnSync('circom',['-l', libLocal, '-l', libNodeModules, 'src/ExamProof.circom','--r1cs','--wasm','--sym','-c','-o','build/'],{stdio:'inherit'}).status);}"
scripts.docker:smoke: docker run --rm -v $(cd .. && pwd):/work -w /work lvp-circuits:local bash -lc "cd circuits && ./scripts/verify-binaries-local.sh && yarn ci-local:gen-proof"
